description.value:
You bolster your allies' physical strength with a hearty exhortation. You and your allies gain a +1 status bonus to Athletics checks and to their DCs against Athletics skill actions such as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Shove], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Trip].

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Song of Strength]

Special If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Inspire Heroics] composition spell, you can use that composition to improve the bonus granted by song of strength in the same way as Inspire Courage or Inspire Defense.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength, +2)]{Success on Inspire Heroics}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Inspire Heroics (Strength, +3)]{Critical success on Inspire Heroics}
